mapper.select: SELECT c.id,comment_title,parent_id,c.user_id,blog_id,comment_date,reply_id, anonymous,content,reply_to,bu.nickname AS user_nickname,bu2.nickname AS reply_nickname,file_name,file_store,relativePath FROM blog_comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_user bu ON c.user_id = bu.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_file bf ON bu.avatar = bf.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_user bu2 ON c.reply_to = bu2.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
